original_text: One of them went away from me, and I said, “He has surely been torn to pieces.” And I have not seen him since.
korean_text: 하나는 내게서 나갔으므로 내가 말하기를 틀림없이 찢겨 죽었다 하고 내가 지금까지 그를 보지 못하거늘

sentences.original_text: One of them went away from me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 명이 나에게서 떠나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He has surely been torn to pieces
And I have not seen him since
